WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded 3.0.8 and tried X12 to XML for an 856 ASN. I ran into Issue 1508. This was supposedly fixed way back when as indicated in this comment: 

dstrubhar wrote Feb 17, 2013 at 1:35 PM

You are correct. I have fixed this serialization to keep the segments with Trailer="true" at the bottom. It is in changeset http://x12parser.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/23145 and I will be doing a release within the next few weeks.

Is this code fix in v3.0.8? Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Issue in the 856 (ASN) Transformation with CTT Segment
